```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(usemodels)
library(lubridate)
tidymodels_prefer()
```


```{r}
# 读入数据
train <- read_csv("train.csv", col_names = TRUE)
```

* recipe之前的预处理：
生成一些recipe的step没有办法生成或难以生成的变量
删除缺失值后再抽样

```{r}
# recipe前的预处理
set.seed(100)
train %>% 
  filter(complete.cases(.)) %>% 
  filter(`Location Description` != "") %>% 
  separate(col = Date, into = c("date", "time", "ap"), sep = " ") %>% 
  mutate(date = mdy(date), time = hms(time)) %>% 
  mutate(Month = month(date), Wday = wday(date), Hour = if_else(ap == "PM", hour(time) + 12, hour(time))) %>% 
  mutate(Block_type = str_split(Block, " ")) %>% 
  mutate(Block_type = sapply(Block_type, function(x) last(unlist(x)))) %>% 
  select(-c(V1, `Case Number`, IUCR, `FBI Code`, `X Coordinate`, `Y Coordinate`, `Updated On`, Latitude, Longitude, Location, 
            Block, date, time, ap)) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.double, as.integer) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.logical, as.factor) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.character, as.factor) %>% 
  sample_n(size = 500000) -> train_sample

# 查看结果
train_sample
dim(train_sample)
```

* tidymodels预处理部分：尽可能将过程放入这里

```{r}
# 使用recipe建立处理过程
crime_rec <- recipe(Arrest ~ ., data = train_sample) %>% 
  update_role(ID, new_role = "ID") %>% 
  step_rename(Primary_type = `Primary Type`, Location_Description = `Location Description`) %>% 
  step_other(Block_type, Primary_type, threshold = 0.001, other = "OTHER_TYPE") %>% 
  step_other(Description, Location_Description, threshold = 0.002, other = "OTHER_TYPE") %>% 
  step_rm(Year) %>% 
  step_novel(all_nominal_predictors()) %>% 
  step_dummy(all_nominal_predictors())
crime_rec
```

```{r}
# 预处理过程训练
crime_prep <- prep(crime_rec) # 注意变量命名规范
crime_prep
tidy(crime_prep)
```

```{r}
# 将转换用在训练数据或者新数据上
crime_bake <- bake(crime_prep, new_data = NULL)
crime_bake
object_size(crime_bake)
```


```{r}
# 查看转换后的结果
# crime_juice <- juice(crime_prep)
# crime_juice

# identical(crime_bake, crime_juice) # 和bake的效果一样
```


```{r}
# 模型设定
rand_forest(trees = 100) %>% # 设定通用参数，共三个
  set_engine("ranger", seed = 100, num.threads = 12, verbose = TRUE) %>%  # 设定每个库对应的参数
  set_mode("classification") -> rf_model
rf_model

# 模型训练
rf_model_fit <- rf_model %>% fit(Arrest ~ ., data = train_sample) # 没有做recipe的预处理转换
rf_model_fit
```

```{r}
# 查看基本信息
rf_model_fit %>% pluck("fit")
```

```{r}
# 建立工作流
rf_wf <- workflow() %>% add_recipe(crime_rec) %>% add_model(rf_model)
rf_wf

# 用工作流拟合训练数据
rf_wf_fit <- fit(rf_wf, data = train_sample) # fit = prep + bake
rf_wf_fit
```
